## Output.distPath property

Set the directory of the dist files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
distPath?: DistPath | undefined;
```

## Example

Use `output` instead of `dist`<!-- -->(the default value):

```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'
export default defineConfig({
  output: {
    distPath: {
      root: './output',
    },
  },
})
```
